scripts.start: HARDHAT_FORK=mainnet yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi --include '{@goldfinch-eng/protocol,@goldfinch-eng/server,@goldfinch-eng/functions}' run start
scripts.start:local: yarn workspace @goldfinch-eng/protocol run generate-merkle-root:local && REACT_APP_GCLOUD_FUNCTIONS_URL=http://localhost:5001/goldfinch-frontends-dev/us-central1 BACKER_MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json BACKER_MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/backerMerkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDistributor/merkleDistributorInfo.dev.json MERKLE_DIRECT_DISTRIBUTOR_INFO_PATH=./blockchain_scripts/merkle/merkleDirectDistributor/merkleDirectDistributorInfo.dev.json CHAIN_IDENTIFIER=http://localhost:8545 LOCAL=yes yarn workspaces foreach --all -pvi --include '{@goldfinch-eng/protocol,@goldfinch-eng/server,@goldfinch-eng/functions}' run start
scripts.lint: yarn stub-dev-deployments && yarn workspaces foreach -pt run lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn stub-dev-deployments && yarn workspaces foreach -pt run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit: yarn workspaces foreach -vA --since --exclude root run pre-commit
